rukus.text: Pamene thambo lidzang’ambika
Ndipo limva ndi kumvera Ambuye wake ndipo ling’ambikadi
Pamene nthaka idzatambasulidwa
Ndi kutulutsa zonse zimene zinakwiriridwa m’kati mwake ndi kukhala yopanda kanthu
Ndipo limva ndi kumvera Ambuye wake ndipo ling’ambikadi
oh iwe munthu! Ndithudi iwe uli kubwerera kupita kwa Ambuye wako ndi ntchito zako. Kubwerera kotsimikizidwa. Motero udzakumana nazo
Koma Iye amene adzapatsidwa Buku lake m’dzanja lamanja
Adzawerengedwa mosavuta
Ndipo adzabwerera kwa anthu ake ndi chisangalalo
Koma iye amene adzapatsidwa buku lake kumbuyo kwake
Iye adzalira
Ndipo akalowa ku moto walawi – lawi ku Gahena
Ndithudi iye adali wansangala pakati pa anthu ake
Ndithudi iye anali kuganiza kuti sadzabwerera kwa Mulungu
Inde! Ndithudi Ambuye wake anali kuona zonse zimene iye ankachita
Ine ndilumbira pali kufiira kwa kulowa kwa dzuwa
Ndi pali usiku ndi zonse zimene umabweretsa mu mdima
Ndi pali mwezi pamene ufika pa chimake penipeni
Ndipo inu, ndithudi, mudzayenda kupita kutsogolo, kuchoka apa ndi kufika apo
Kodi ndi chifukwa chiyani choti iwo alibe chikhulupiriro
Ndipo pamene Korani ili kuwerengedwa kwa iwo sagwa pansi. Al-Buruj
Iyayi! Koma anthu osakhulupirira amalikana
Ndipo Mulungu amadziwa zinthu zonse zimene amasonkhanitsa
Choncho auze iwo za chilango chowawa
Kupatula okhawo amene akhulupirira ndi kumachita ntchito zabwino, chifukwa iwo ali ndi malipiro opanda malire
